summary: Comprehensive testing of Admin Voucher Management and Listing Moderation UI pages. All backend APIs (16/16 tests) passed. Frontend UI for both pages is fully functional with proper navigation, CRUD operations, and settings management.

issues: Console warning: 'The width(-1) and height(-1) of chart should be greater than 0' - charts may not render properly initially but this is a minor cosmetic issue

critical_code_review_comments: Voucher Management UI is well-designed with stats cards, filters, and a comprehensive create/edit dialog
Listing Moderation UI properly implements three tabs: Moderation Queue, Moderation Log, and Settings
All toggle switches in Settings tab are functional and save correctly
Tier limits configuration allows customizable limits for Free, Basic, and Premium tiers
seed_data_creation: Test vouchers created during API testing (TESTCODE50_*, UPDATE_TEST_*, etc.) - some were deleted as part of CRUD testing, WELCOME20 existing voucher verified
context_for_next_testing_agent: Vouchers and Listing Moderation features fully tested and working. Backend APIs at /api/admin/vouchers/* and /api/admin/listing-moderation/* are functional. Frontend pages at /dashboard/vouchers and /dashboard/listing-moderation are accessible after admin login.

vouchers_page_loads.details: Page loads at /dashboard/vouchers with header 'Voucher Management'

vouchers_stats_cards.details: Stats cards visible: Total Vouchers, Active Vouchers, Total Redemptions, Total Discounts Given

vouchers_create_dialog.details: Create New Voucher dialog opens with all required fields: Code, Type, Value, Description, Max Uses, Valid Until, and restriction toggles

vouchers_table.details: Vouchers table displays Code, Type, Value, Usage, Status, Valid Until columns with action buttons (View, Edit, Delete)

vouchers_filters.details: Status and Type filter dropdowns visible and functional

vouchers_existing_data.details: WELCOME20 voucher (20% percent discount) visible in table

moderation_page_loads.details: Page loads at /dashboard/listing-moderation with header 'Listing Moderation'

moderation_queue_tab.details: Moderation Queue tab shows listings with status filter (Pending Review, Approved, Rejected)

moderation_log_tab.details: Moderation Log tab shows history with proper empty state 'No moderation history'

moderation_settings_tab.details: Settings tab shows all configuration options: Enable Listing Moderation, Require Moderation, Auto-approve settings, Default Tier, Tier Limits

moderation_save_settings.details: Save Settings button visible and API endpoint /api/admin/listing-moderation/limits/settings working

backend_voucher_crud.details: All CRUD operations tested: Create, Read, Update, Delete vouchers via API

backend_voucher_stats.details: Voucher statistics endpoint returns proper data: total_vouchers, active_vouchers, total_redemptions

backend_moderation_queue.details: Moderation queue endpoint returns listings with proper filtering by status

backend_moderation_settings.details: Settings GET and PUT endpoints working for moderation configuration
